confirm.submit-warning: Once you have submitted your application, you will not be able to adjust it. Please check it is correct.

complete.content-copy-sent: We have sent you a confirmation email
complete.content-feedback-link-text: What do you think of this service?

work-visa-types-inside-uk.header: Did you apply for a Health and Care Worker visa?
work-visa-types-inside-uk.paragraph: A Health and Care Worker visa allows medical professionals to do an eligible job with the NHS, an NHS supplier or in adult social care.
